titles.title: Providing for the concurrence by the House in the Senate amendment to H.R. 7776, with an amendment.

Providing for the concurrence by the House in the Senate amendment to H.R. 7776, with an amendment.

action.text: Mr. Smith (WA) moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 1512.
DEBATE - The House resumed with debate on H. Res. 1512.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: (2/3 required): 350 - 80 (Roll no. 516).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution provides for House adoption and amendment of H.R. 7776, the James M. Inhofe National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2023.
